page.description: Update a sheet using a raw JSON Array or arrays (at optional range / default to A1 if unspecified)
page.prototype: UpdateSheetRaw as L(sheetname as C,values as C[, range as C])
page.example: dim gs as helper::GoogleSheet gs.namedresource= "<namedresource>" gs.spreadsheet= "<spreadsheetid>" gs.UpdateSheetRaw("customers",<<%JSON% [ [ "jane", "doe" ] ] %JSON%,"B1:B1")
